channel.title: How do i make my own moparscape Source?
channel.description: Hi guys i have been reading a lot about coding a moparscape server and i was wooding loads of people have made there own source so why can't i. I will never use the moparscape client because it's bad are use my own :P

item.title: How do i make my own moparscape Source?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Why the fuck would you need a whole new program to edit config files? If you don’t understand what you’re doing, then get the fuck out, or learn.

`Rich:

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own moparscape Source?
